T

testHeapSize() - Static method in class com.example.pingpong.HeapStackTest
Tests the limits of JVM heap memory by repeatedly allocating large arrays and monitoring memory usage and average allocation time until an OutOfMemoryError is thrown.
testStackSize() - Static method in class com.example.pingpong.HeapStackTest
Tests the JVM stack size limits by performing a deep recursive method call and records the depth of recursion at which a StackOverflowError occurs.
